attributes.action: Don't deport Luqman Onikosi, doing so would almost certainly result in his death
attributes.additional_details:
By signing this, you could help save his life. On average, international students pay triple the amount of home students, and contribute 2.8bn a year to the economy of London alone, according to the Guardian newspaper. Luqman has been an active and committed student, having co-coordinated 'Black History Month' and co-founded the 'Hear Afrika society'.

http://www.theguardian.com/education/2016/mar/09/sussex-university-protesters-occupation-student-deportation-luqman-onikosi
attributes.background: Luqman Onikosi, is a student at the University of Sussex, and his deportation would essentially be a death sentence. He is chronically ill and the medication he needs to stay alive is not available in Nigeria, where his two brothers have already died from the same disease.
